response:

2. Passion - old
3. Tranquility - young

6. Celebrated - old
7. Smile - young
8. Content - old

10. Ghastly - old

12. Ugly - old
13. Malevolent - young
14. Gruesome - old
15. Defeat - young
16. Injury - old

I hope this exercise brings us closer together, my love.

Yours always,
